snippet: A video released by Sarah Palin's political action committee features glowing comments from Steve Schmidt and Nicole Wallace, campaign staffers from 2008.
abstract: A video released by Sarah Palin's political action committee features glowing comments from Steve Schmidt and Nicole Wallace, campaign staffers from 2008.

headline.main: In Video, Palin Rebuts Portrayal in HBO Movie
headline.print_headline: Fighting Back: Palin Rebuts Movie Portrayal
